Jobs.title: Vice President / Client Business Leader - Merchant Information Services
Vice President / Senior Business Leader - Information Services
Vice President, Business Development and Co-founder

summary: ', '    Creative, analytical and results oriented sales and business development professional. 20 years of experience leading strategic planning, implementation and management of sales and business development efforts in corporate and venture-funded start-up environments.  Skilled at identifying and analyzing new, profitable business and channel opportunities in complex environments.  Results-focused leader with extensive experience and success in driving profitable growth in competitive markets.  A proven business leader skilled at building and managing teams to deliver superior results.', '', 'Currently, leading a team of sales professionals in the launch of new information products.', '
